title: Coinbase Expands Futures Offering, Unveils ‘Institutional-Sized’ Bitcoin and Ether Contracts
description: On June 1, Coinbase revealed its plans to extend bitcoin and ether futures contracts to institutional investors through its derivatives exchange. The firm mentioned that the Coinbase Bitcoin (BTI) and Ether (ETI) futures contracts would be accessible via third-party institutional futures commission merchants (FCMs) and brokerage firms. Coinbase to Launch New Bitcoin and Ether Futures […]

title: Top 4 Hong Kong & Chinese Coins under $1 – Part 1
description:
On June 1st, China allowed Hong Kong to start limited crypto retail trading. This is big news. Many exchanges plan to get a license in Hong Kong. And, is this the start of a Chinese coins invasion? Will China reverse its crypto ban?  In light of this, we look at 4 top Chinese coins under […]

title: Ripple Partners With DoraHacks to Organize an Online Hackathon
description:
Ripple has Partnered with DoraHacks to organize an online hackathon. The exercise targets developers from diverse backgrounds to explore blockchain technology. Participating projects can win up to $10,000 to support their project’s development. Ripple has Partnered with DoraHacks to organize an online hackathon to support innovative projects. The exercise aims to get developers from diverse […]
